mapper.select:
select to_char(o.org_code) DICVALUE ,(select t2.org_name from sys_org t2 where t2.validate_state='1' and t2.id=o.parent_id)||'-'||o.org_name DICNAME from sys_org o where 1=1
start with o.org_name='捷越联合'
connect by prior o.id = o.parent_id and o.validate_state='1' order siblings by o.id

select to_char(t1.org_id)||'${codeType}' DICVALUE ,(select t2.org_name from vmtree_info t2 where t2.org_type=#{codeType} and t2.org_id=t1.parent_id )||'-'||t1.org_name DICNAME from vmtree_info t1 where 1=1 start with t1.org_name='捷越联合' connect by prior t1.org_id = t1.parent_id and t1.org_type=#{codeType} order siblings by t1.org_id
